name: Universal Charger
description:
Universal Charger is a game about plugging entire planets into a giant power outlet in space.

Controls:
Movement is handled with arrow keys
Follow Onscreen prompts to navigate menus

NOTE: all towers in this game need energy to fire. They'll display a lightning bolt icon if they would be shooting at an enemy if not for their lack of power. This is, admittedly, not very well explained in game.
